Title: Pledge to liberate all mankind
Designer: "Raid on the White Tiger Regiment" Art Creation Group (《奇袭白虎团》美术创作组)
Publisher: Shandong renmin chubanshe (山东人民出版社)
Notes: The textile worker holds a copy of the Constitution of the Chinese Communist Party (中国共产党章程), adopted April 1969. In the background is Wu Qionghua (吴琼花), heroine of the revolutionary model ballet The Red Detachment of Women (红色娘子军).See also: BG E37/526
